item.description:
We'll be hosting a Season of Reason (holiday/winter) party on Saturday, December 18th, 2010. This will be pot luck style as usual. For those attending, it will be helpful if you can list your food, drinks, and/or snacks that you can contribute under this Meetup event page.

In place of a yankee/santa swap, we'd like to have a "science swap." Be creative, have fun, and no need to go shopping for this. Bring some kind of wrapped up science or skeptic themed item from your home.

ideas: book, video, uniquely themed item, etc. (throw in a favorite quote of reason for some spice)

Last years' party was fun and we're looking forward to bringing our friends back together for another great time.

A Season related episode will be included from the "Big Bang Theory". (~20mins) Here's an introduction to the series. http://www.youtube.co...

More details will be posted soon.

Create your own clove designed orange.



..~..~ Lindsay and Darrick ~..~..
item.name: Season of Reason Party!
